source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Microsoft Paint 3D (MS Paint 3D) for Beginners
items.headline: Microsoft Paint 3D (MS Paint 3D) for beginners: Introduction to 3D Digital art and painting
objectives_summary: Microsoft Paint 3D Fundamentals
New, Open, Save, Save As, Close, Import, Export and Quit
Working with 2D and 3D Objects

items.title: CATIA V5:DMU Kinematics
items.headline: Study of Kinematic Joints
objectives_summary: Creating complex mechanism using kinamtics joints such as 4 Bar chain,Elliptical Trammel,Rack and pinion simulation.
Revolute joint
prismatic Joint

items.title: Substance Painter - Hand painted trunk
items.headline: painted cartoony trunk
objectives_summary: Using substance painter professionally
Understnding the meaninng of the different kinds of maps like : normal - height - diffuse and so on
Learning hand painting stuff

items.title: VFX Compositing: Create a 3D Planet in After effects.
items.headline: Learn to create a cinematic realistic 3D Earth with powerful after effects tools and pro techniques.
objectives_summary: Create and animate cinematic realistic 3D planet Earth from images.
Create atmosphere around planet.
How to key green screen footages.

items.title: Adobe After Effects : Create Creative Text Animation
items.headline: Learn how to use Adobe after effects To Create Creative Text Animation
objectives_summary: working with text animator to create high quality text animation
how to create neon text in after effects
Create write on Text Animation using Adobe After Effects

items.headline: Learn all about Shape Layers and also how to create Shape Elements in After Effects
objectives_summary: Shape Layers in After Effects

items.title: DESIGN GEAR MODELS & CREATE GEAR TRAIN MOTION ANALYSIS
items.headline: LEARN ALL ABOUT GEAR DESIGN & CREATE GEAR TRAIN
objectives_summary: STUDENTS WILL LEARN TO MAKE GEAR FROM SCRATCH AND LEARN BASIC GEAR CONCEPTS

items.title: Build a Coaster Cart Game Asset in Maya with Substance

visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality 3d and Game Art Training by Industry Pros!
visible_instructors.name: 3dmotive
visible_instructors.title: 3dmotive LLC

items.headline: Create complex shaders and materials for games and film with Substance!
objectives_summary: Create high quality textures for props or characters.
Use multiple approaches for creating believable materials using base materials from Substance Painter 2 or by manually making them from fill layers.
Use Marmoset Toolbag 3 to create detailed lighting and utilize post effects to make Portfolio ready screenshots of their props.

items.title: Blender 2.8 Learning To Create 3D Models
items.headline: Journey To The 3D World As The Creator To Whatever You Want To Make
objectives_summary: How to use the 3D viewport In Blender
Create 'placeholder' models using lego style modelling techniques also referred to as block modelling
Use many of Blenders core editing tools such as the extrude and bevel tools

items.title: Particles in Maya -1
items.headline: Particles in Maya
objectives_summary: Particles in MAYA .  Rendering in Arnold
Basic of Maya Particles , Solid Examples on Particle Creation.

items.title: Hands-On SolidWorks
items.headline: Design and deliver powerful Designs with SolidWorks
objectives_summary: How to sketch 2D drawings and create a fully constrained picture
Gain the understanding to create sketch-based features and apply a combination of modifying techniques (extrude, revolve, sweep, loft)
Learn to modify 3D bodies using modifying tools (fillete, chamfer, shell, and rob)

items.title: Blender beginner to intermediate, basics and training
items.headline: The complete course to master Blender version 2.8 3D modeling software
objectives_summary: Understand the dashboard
Use the different windows
Master object mode

work confidently with render elements
composite people and life into your existing images

objectives_summary: Students will learn 3ds Max software
